title: Center for NeuroSciences Operations Fund
description: To support the ongoing operations of the Center for NeuroScience and to assist in the development of collaborative neuroscience research at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus at the discretion of the Director.
marketingContent: To support the ongoing operations of the Center for NeuroScience and to assist in the development of collaborative neuroscience research at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus at the discretion of the Director.
